title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2402 - Taxpayer Record Retention Formats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2402 - Taxpayer Record Retention Formats

State Regulations
§ 2402.1 - Taxpayer's option to choose a record retention format
§ 2402.2 - Electronic record retention

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2402

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
